channel.title: iGerman - All I Need Is You (feat. Junior Paes) [Future Bass]
channel.description:
[So here is the finished track!](https://soundcloud.com/igerman00/all-i-need-is-you/s-W0Fo9)
This is a future bass track I made for around 3 hours in Auxy + FL Studio (vocal chops and mastering, and slight bass editing, everything else is Auxy)
If you want an Auxy only (instrumental) version: [Here it is on my server as a wav ;)](http://igmn.tk/storage/Sx/img/AllINeedIsYou%20Auxy%20Only%20version.wav)
For now, it is private on SoundCloud until I make a proper video for my YT channel, but you can listen to it now beacuse I love you <3!
